summary: Weekly standup meeting summary covering progress updates, action items, and next meeting date.
questions: What were the key action items from the meeting?
Who is responsible for the API keys issue?
What is the status of the frontend redesign?
When is the next standup meeting?
What are the current blockers for team members?
title: Weekly Standup Notes - October 18, 2024
text:
# Weekly Standup Notes

**Date:** October 18, 2024
**Time:** 10:00 AM - 10:30 AM
**Attendees:** Mike Chen, Lisa Park, David Kumar, Emma White

## Discussion Points
- Mike completed the user authentication feature
- Lisa is working on database optimization (ETA: Friday)
- David blocked on API keys from vendor
- Emma started work on frontend redesign

## Action Items
- [ ] Mike: Review Lisa's PR by EOD
- [ ] David: Follow up with vendor (Stripe) about API access
- [ ] Emma: Share mockups in Slack by Wednesday

## Next Meeting
October 25, 2024 @ 10:00 AM

relationships.context: Follow up with vendor (Stripe) about API access
Share mockups in Slack by Wednesday
